section.title: CalendarRow.h
section.programlisting: 1 // Fill out your copyright notice in the Description page of Project Settings. 2 3 #pragma once 4 5 #include "CoreMinimal.h" 6 #include "UObject/NoExportTypes.h" 7 #include "CalendarUIBase.h" 8 #include "CalendarRow.generated.h" 9 10 USTRUCT(BlueprintType) 11 struct FMyBaseSructure 12 { 13 GENERATED_BODY() 14 15 UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "Calendar Properties") 16 int32 Row; 17 18 UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "Calendar Properties") 19 int32 Year; 20 21 UPROPERTY(EditAnywhere, BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "Calendar Properties") 22 int32 Month; 23 24 UPROPERTY(BlueprintReadOnly, Category = "Calendar Properties") 25 FLinearColor SelectedGridColor; 26 27 UPROPERTY(BlueprintReadOnly, Category = "Calendar Properties") 28 FLinearColor EmptyGridColor; 29 30 UPROPERTY(BlueprintReadOnly, Category = "Calendar Properties") 31 FLinearColor GridColor; 32 }; 33 34 UCLASS(BlueprintType) 35 class UCalendarRow : public UObject 36 { 37 GENERATED_BODY() 38 39 public: 40 UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Calendar Functions") 41 void Init(int32 RowValue, 42 int32 year, 43 int32 month, 44 FLinearColor color1, 45 FLinearColor color2, 46 FLinearColor color3, 47 UCalendarUIBase* InOwner 48 ); 49 50 UPROPERTY(BlueprintReadWrite, Category = "Atm0s Calendar Variables") 51 FMyBaseSructure structure; 52 53 UPROPERTY(BlueprintReadOnly, Category = "Owner") 54 UCalendarUIBase* Owner; 55 56 }; 57
